Script.name: kinstall
Script.script: if kinstallEvent ~= nil then killAnonymousEventHandler(kinstallEvent) end kinstallEvent = registerAnonymousEventHandler("kinstallInit", function() dofile(getMudletHomeDir():gsub("\\", "/") .. "/kinstall/main.lua") tempTimer(0, function() raiseEvent("kinstallLoaded") end) end) raiseEvent('kinstallInit')
